item.description:
Our agenda is to promote Barbershop Quartet and Chorus Singing and to share tips, techniques, and stuff going on, and to have fun with other members.

Initially, my Chorus, Sounds of Concord, will sponsor it and provide space, but we might consider moving to another date/time if that is more convenient.

Feel free to bring music that you might want to try, but we'll also have some there. We also have learning CD's so don't feel intimidated if you are not a music reader.

Our Chorus typically goes out to dinner after rehearsals, (about 10 P.M.). We have fun, sing a bunch, and try some new things, so for those who are late nighters, that is an option too.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Lee Daum or Dan Costello or Jim Kenealy from Sounds of Concord. We rehearse in this location at 7:30.

group.name: Boston Area Acapella Barbershop Quartet/Chorus Singing

item.name: The Boston Area Barbershop Quartet Singing Meetup
